moduleMetadataJson.name: BusyBox SMB Sharing
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will be applied on a session connected to a BusyBox shell. It will modify
        the SMB configuration of the device executing BusyBox to share the root directory of
        the device.
author: Javier Vicente Vallejo

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
